dmca.title: Crooked Brook complains about copied chef coat text
dmca.body:
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the home page of the
website www.crookedbrook.com (two entire paragraphs under the heading of Egyptian Cotton Chef Coats.)

The material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed above:

Search query: "Egyptian cotton chef coats" is about as descriptive as "Indian Ocean fish fillets". 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.bragardusa.com/learn_about_egyptian_cotton_chef_jackets.asp - 34k -

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[signature]
[private]
[private]@crookedbrook.com
[private]
Utica, New York 13501
T - [private]
F - [private]
www.crookedbrook.com
